name: What is the purpose of this event?
des: This event is to celebrate and recognize the women who have influenced the tech industry and beyond.

name: Who is the audience for the event?
des: Anyone can attend. We welcome women and allies to attend the event. Also, we would require your cooperation in adhering to our Community Guidelines.

name: What are the event charges?
des: This event is completely free of charge.

name: Will there be moderation?
des: Yes! We have dedicated volunteers who will moderate all the sessions. If you witness any attendee breaching the code of conduct, please reach out to us at wtmindia2020@gmail.com.

name: Will I need to be on video?
des: It is not necessary that you be on video. However, please participate in discussions while the event session is in progress.

name: Will the sessions be recorded?
des: Yes! The sessions will be recorded and would live on this website for you to access the content.
